name: Greedy Goblin (Loot'n Scoot Studios)
description:
Greedy Goblin is 3D ‘Looter Scooter'. Loot Legendary Artifacts and Gold while steadily solving puzzles and outwitting your foes.

You are a Greedy Goblin! You have stolen from The Goblin King and your punishment is to retrieve the highly sought-after cursed artifacts. Don’t worry about dying, there are plenty of goblins to replace you. Once you have collected all of the artifacts, make your way to the exit portal and return the stolen artifacts to their “rightful” owner.

LOOT: Loot Legendary Artifacts and Gold to meet The Goblin King’s demand.

SCOOT: Use goblin abilities to outsmart and evade enemy adventurers.

============================================

FALL 2020:

Developed by Kendrick Austin, Nathan Ayoubi, Brandon Butterbaugh, Peter Howley, Jinrui Hu, Chandler Jeffcoat, Jonathon Lamb, Ivan Lee, Devyn Lehrman, Lin Pan, McKane Searle, Ke Shen, Brandon Trimble, Mitchell Walker, Zhenyue Wang, Cameron Waters, Ryan Whittle, Feng Zhu.

EAE 4500 – First Semester of Capstone Game Development in the University of Utah's Entertainment Arts and Engineering program. Second Semester Release Coming Spring 2021!

============================================

MUSIC:

Music and Sound Effects by Ben Lipkin | lipkinaudio.com
